parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Program Flow

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if file on given path exists. Uses same path resolve code as [[loadFile]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[fileExists]] path

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> path: [[String]] - Path to file

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if it exists, otherwise [[false]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[fileExists]] "\a3\mySuperPath\bestFileEver.paa"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Returns [[false]]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _path [[a = b|=]] "a3\functions_f_mp_mark\revive\_addaction_revive.inc";

[[if]] ([[fileExists]] _path) [[then]] {[[loadFile]] _path} [[else]] {[[diag_log]] [[format]] ["File (%1) does not exist!",_path]};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[loadFile]] [[preprocessFile]] [[preprocessFileLineNumbers]]
</value></part></template></root>
